channel.title: Need a good restarter - Antilag doesn't work, neither does Voule!
channel.description: Heya guys, when I use Voule auto restarter on my dedi, It flashes up a batch file, which then closes immediatley, the actual program runs, but it just doesn't work properly. I don't know wtf is up with that god damn antilag class, but it doesn't work although I can see it's process() being called in the server class along with the rest. -.- Help would take me a long way. Thanks.

item.title: Need a good restarter - Antilag doesn't work, neither does Voule!
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Here this works for me.

@Title Corey’s Auto-Restarter
@echo Corey’s Auto-Restarter is Running…
@PING -n 1800 newcoreyscape.no-ip.biz >nul
@echo Closing server
@tskill java
@PING -n 3 newcoreyscape.no-ip.biz >nul
@echo Starting up server
@PING -n 3 newcoreyscape.no-ip.biz >nul
@start .\runserver.cmd
@echo .
@Goto end[/code]

YOU MUST change all the newcoreyscape.no-ip.biz to your server ip. You can change corey’s auto-restarter to your name if you want. And the thing that actually makes it timed is the 1800. Mine restarts every 30 minutes. Change it by seconds.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good restarter - Antilag doesn't work, neither does Voule!

If you trust me, I have Rofllmao456’s auto restarter, which is a .exe.

Here(if you’re scared don’t download it): http://uppit.com/d2/N1ULGW/09cf89ef7ea89325ff28762c2b7ebeb3/Restarter.exe

item.title: Need a good restarter - Antilag doesn't work, neither does Voule!
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

@echo off
cls
echo Voule Auto restart
tskill java /a
echo Restarting servar
color 0a
title Hiya-Scape Autorestart
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
